introText: Sierra Command: You have authorized the deployment of the nuclear warhead to contain the outbreak at Sierra Lab. Detonation imminent.

choices.message: Nuclear warhead detonated. The blast eradicates the outbreak but devastates the facility and surrounding areas.
You abort the detonation at the last moment, seeking alternative solutions. The outbreak worsens.

nuclear_epilogue.introText:
The detonation has contained the supernatural outbreak but at a terrible cost.

Most of the lab personnel were lost in the blast. Tens of thousands have been displaced due to radioactive fallout. The surrounding city lies in ruins.

You saved the nation from a global catastrophe, but the price will haunt you and the world for decades.

--- MISSION COMPLETE ---

outbreak_worsens.introText:
Without the nuclear option, the outbreak has spread uncontrollably.

The containment breach is now a global emergency.

--- MISSION FAILED ---
